trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted" /> routed events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos roteados <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed" /> e <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> represents the method that implements the command logic of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> representa o método que implementa a lógica de comando de um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: Separating the implementation logic from the command allows the command to be invoked from different sources and types and enables the centralization of command logic.
trans-unit.target: Separando a lógica de implementação do comando permite que o comando a ser invocado de origens diferentes e tipos e permite a centralização da lógica de comando.

trans-unit.source: This event data class is also used for <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe de dados de evento também é usado para <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: But most practical handlers will handle the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> events from a particular <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>, rather than work at the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> level.
trans-unit.target: Mas manipuladores mais práticos tratará o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> eventos de um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>, em vez de trabalhar no <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> nível.

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comandos, consulte [Visão geral dos comandos](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> that opens a <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox> when the command is executed.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> que abre um <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox> quando o comando é executado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comando que foi invocado.

trans-unit.source: The command associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: O comando associado ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The command associated with the event can be cast to the specific implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, if the type is known.
trans-unit.target: O comando associado ao evento pode ser convertido para a implementação específica de <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, como um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, se o tipo é conhecido.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> that handles multiple commands.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> que lida com vários comandos.

trans-unit.source: The handler checks the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Command%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs> to determine which method to call.
trans-unit.target: As verificações de manipulador de <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Command%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs> para determinar qual método de chamada.

trans-unit.source: Gets data parameter of the command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o parâmetro de dados do comando.

trans-unit.source: The command-specific data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados específicos ao comando.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This property represents a generic data parameter that is defined by the particular command.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa um parâmetro de dados genérico que é definido pelo comando específico.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is not needed, `null` can be passed.
trans-unit.target: Se esse parâmetro não for necessária, `null` pode ser passado.

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter%2A> is used to pass specific information to the command when it is executed.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter%2A> é usado para transmitir informações específicas para o comando quando ele é executado.

trans-unit.source: The type of the data is defined by the command.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de dados é definido pelo comando.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> for a custom <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> para um personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: The handler updates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> with the current time and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control that is passed to the handler through the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: As atualizações do manipulador um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> com a hora atual e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controle é passado para o manipulador por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
